replies.body:
**Flow Chart for people with Malphite on their team**


                        Is {{champion:54}}'s ult up?

                    /            \
                   Yes            No
                  /               \
                 /                 \
         Get ready for a ping and to follow up <-------------------------  Wait

                /            
            Did Malphite ult?
            /      \
           Yes       No
           /        \
Forget to follow up and watch him die   '' {{champion:54}} A summoner has disconnected''

{{champion:202}} "Only Perfection"

I had an AP {{champion:54}}  mid lane today, i was kinda concerned as he was getting bullied in lane early on. 

Later in the game he would walk up into a 2v1 and i'm thinking "oh no...he's gonna die"

R-Q...100-0's their {{champion:236}} and smacks {{champion:420}} to death as my jaw drops.
*smacks made my day
If you have Sion on your Team you can Knock-up the enemy mid-laner 3 times XD

sounds about right. when i play malphite i just farm for 20 minutes, come to the team fight location, press r, win teamfight, then profit. so much skill is involved in this champion...

I assume you mean farm the enemy toplaner?  Because those guys are SQUISHY levels 6-8!

I really learned a lot from this guide. Ill look to use some of the tips and tricks in my next few games. Great depth and detail, I can safely say that I think I could teach someone how to play Malphite now. :)
